postText: Hey guys, I'm looking for a drummer for a bebop gig on April 25th, anyone available?.
There's a jam session every Tuesday night at the Gaslight Tavern, 8pm til late, all welcome.
I'm heading up a big band for a cruise in 2024, auditions coming up in July, spread the word, will keep you posted.
Anyone want to put a small group together for the annual October long weekend Jazz Festival in Manly, Australia?
I'd like to put together a sax quartet, any takers?
